/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the sidewalks, pedestrians can be seen going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. In the background, trees provide a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, further enhancing the vibrancy of the scene.
